name: .UWRF File Extension
summary: Learn about .UWRF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by Universal Web Radio, a program used to access web radio stations to listen to music; contains radio station information, such as the station link, that is referenced by Universal Web Radio in order to play the station.

content: NOTE: The Universal Web Radio program requires an Internet connection in order to play music from the radio stations. To start listening to a radio station, simply double-click the UWRF file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
